channel.title: Okay, when I try to make a post
channel.description: When I try to make a post in the section about private servers, it says i need to take the quiz, i haven't taken this, but when i try, it always re-directs me here?... I'm lost.

item.title: Okay, when I try to make a post
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

You need to do the quiz to get onto moparscape Because the quiz flushes out some of the noobs who cant be arsed reading and following the rules… sounds familiar dont you think? Have you read the rules? Followed them?

Read full topic
item.source: Okay, when I try to make a post
